product_title: Dreo Space Heater, Portable Electric Heaters for Indoor Use with Thermostat and Remote, 2024 Upgraded, Digital Display, 12H Timer, 5 Mode, 1500W PTC Ceramic Fast Safety Heat for Office Bedroom Home
about_product: Powerful heat that fits everywhere: Dreo space heaters for indoor combines Hyperamics 1500W advanced PTC system with a new heat funnel design to deliver heat within seconds and enhance warm air circulation for up to 200% farther reach than traditional heaters.

Unbreakable safety: Dreo goes beyond the unexpected to deliver peace of mind with every room heater. The innovative tilt-detection sensor improves accuracy and reliability for better tip-over protection, and built with V0 flame retardant materials, overheat protection, and safety plug, all certified by ETL.

Ultimate temperature control: The enhanced NTC chipset brings more precision to turn your space heater with thermostat into a smart heating powerhouse, allowing you to set heat on a wider range from 41-95℉ with 1℉ increments, saving you energy while keeping you comfortable.

Cozy quietness: No more choosing between quiet or warmth, Dreo's heater for bedroom warms quietly thanks to its brushless DC motor with frictionless performance and a winglet fan design that reduces turbulence, reducing noise to only 34dB.

Fits into your lifestyle: This portable heater handle makes it easier to carry and is equipped with multiple heating levels and modes to heat as you like (Power heat, ECO, Fan Only). It also features handy extras for a hassle-free experience (remote control, 12-hour timer, mute, child lock, and memory function).

We Are Always Here for You: To ensure a pleasant experience for everyone while using the heater, it is recommended to carefully read the precautions in the user manual and QSG before use. Let our product experts guide you through any issues or questions you might have with the product at any time with our customer support line.

customers_say: Customers find this space heater to be excellent, noting it works well for small rooms, is quiet, and provides good heat output. They appreciate its compact size that's sufficient for small spaces, and its ability to warm rooms quickly and keep them toasty. Customers like the remote control feature, with one mentioning how convenient it is for adjusting settings.

top_reviews.review_comment: I really like this space heater! I bought it for my office because it is always kept cold on our floor, and this changed the game for me. First, its SUPER CUTE (I bought the one with the gold rim). Second, the remote control is convenient and easy. Third, it works perfectly. I don't need the highest option of the three, the first or second work great, the third gets too warm and my office is quite spacey. Finally, its nice and quiet. A great buy!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Small but Mighty - The perfect office heater!
top_reviews.review_comment: This thing is so quiet! When it’s on ECO mode I don’t even hear it kick on to regulate the temp. It puts out great heat and I especially liked being able to disable the button sounds (because my coworkers don’t need to hear every time my feet feel cold, lol). Perfect for my office and the remote makes it easy to adjust the settings without even getting up from my desk. 10 out 10 recommend!!!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great heater for a reasonable price
top_reviews.review_comment: I’ve had my heater for about a week now and it is working great. I’m using it on my inclosed terrace (10’x 14’) and it heats it up in a couple of minutes. The noise level is very low so it wouldn’t disturb sleep. So far I’m very happy with my purchase.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: A winter must have for the office.
top_reviews.review_comment: This little guy packs a punch. It gets really hot really fast if you like to keep it under your desk by your feet. It warms up a room nicely and isn’t too loud. I love being able to use the remote and love the look of it it. The tip-over sensor works as expected. I only wish it oscillated, but I really have no complaints.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Gets the job done as do most ceramic heaters with similar specs. Quiet operation with reasonable choices for fixed or fully automatic heat level. Accurate thermostat; sensor is low and in the rear so less apt to be influenced by unit heat. Appreciate the simple remote that puts all controls at my fingertips. Clean appearance; blends in with room furnishings versus standing out as an appliance. Have tried several options over the years with varying levels of satisfaction. This one is a keeper.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Fantastic heater. This is the one to buy.
top_reviews.review_comment: Best space heater I’ve ever had. The fan in this unit moves air better than others that I’ve owned and it really does throw the heat twice as far. It’s got some nice thermostat controls that let you choose a temperature up to 95 degrees and it maintains that temperature nicely. The other option is H1 (low), H2 (medium) and H3 (high) which control heat output without dialing in specific temperatures. And then there’s basic fan mode with no heat. It’s well built and operates very quietly. I use it in the bathroom (might be overkill) and I always get warm towels stepping out of the shower. When turning the unit off. The heat stops immediately but the fan will continue to spin with a 30 second count down to cool down the unit. A nice feature. I love this little heater and would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone looking for one.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Perfect for heating a small space
top_reviews.review_comment: Three heat settings, 1000, 1300 or 1500W, make it more than adequate for my medium sized bathroom. I like the fact it has auto shut off and can be set easily. Instructions were mostly clear enough to just use the quick set-up sheet. Choosing between just on with one of the settings or auto thermostat is a nice feature, I prefer the latter. Great heater, quick output, great price. Highly recommend.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Wow!  Now this is a Space Heater
top_reviews.review_comment: In sticking to my policy of reviewing products that are either exceptional or a waste of money, this bad boy warrants an immediate review. Holy Crow! Exceptional! Now I know how a space heater is supposed to work. I've been loyal to a Lasko model 754200 for years, purchasing it 2-3 times in the last 9 years. After cleaning it the other day it stopped producing hot air on the low setting, AGAIN! And the high setting was nothing to write home about. This has happened before and I am sick of it. So, I searched, compared, read reviews and selected this Dreo model DR-HSH006. I never expected such fantastic results. This thing is great! It isn't a fan blowing out warmish air, it's putting out HEAT! Serious heat! I ran it for an hour this morning and the temp in my living room increased from 71 to 77 degrees! WOW! That has NEVER happened before. My HVAC doesn't even warm my place up like that! Additionally, I ran it because I got soaked from the rain. I set my shoes, socks and pants in front of it and in less than an hour they are all dry! And it wasn't even on the highest setting! It was on the middle setting H2. The Lasko would take hours to dry my shoes! Inside and out! Took less than an hour for Dreo! The model itself is a round, black colored unit, with push-buttons on top to operate. I was concerned about breakage with buttons instead of dials, but the buttons are so sensitive (not in a bad way) that just a light push or tap, or a Jedi Mind Trick garners results. Indeed, as other reviewers state, the buttons are hard to see in a poorly lit room, and they could use a white outline or illumination to see them better. However, with the results I've gotten I'll accept that trade-off. But Dreo, for next year's model make that change, customers will thank you. And Lasko, go back to the drawing board and do whatever these Dreo guys did, because you just got crushed, badly! In additon, I like the timer feature, and since this bad boy does such an effective job blasting out heat that timer is a great feature so I won't awaken to a sauna. Also, I would lay on the floor and camp in front of my Lasko to get warmed up. The heat discharge was a straight line, but not this unit. The Dreo has an expaded heat disharge zone in comparison. You can even feel it standing near the unit. Can't do that with Lasko, you'd have to be directly in front of it. Because this Dreo heats up the space so quickly and effectively, I've not even needed to fiddle with the temp setting, I can run it for a few minutes and presto, it's warm enough that I can turn the unit off. This unit will save me oodles on the electric and gas costs to run my HVAC, supplanting the need to run the HVAC so frequently. And it will save me even more electric bill money because I don't need to run this heater for hours for effective results like with my former Lasko model. Assuming nothing chages in the future, and no buttons break, or malfunctions occur, I highly recommend this space heater.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023

top_reviews_global.review_title: Burnt out in less than 6 weeks of use
top_reviews_global.review_comment: I’ve received it early January, I didn’t use it daily, left it on for a few a hours each time (3-4 hrs) on the lowest setting most of the time & it already broke. luckily it happened when no one was next to it, so no one got hurt & it didn’t cause a fire, but it’s disappointing to pay this much for it to burn off in less than 6 weeks.
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in Saudi Arabia on February 11, 2024

top_reviews_global.review_comment: El producto se adapta de una manera increíble, cumple con diferentes funciones y todas son excelentes, definitivamente recomiendo esta compra, ten en cuenta que tarda el envío

Excelente calidad y muy bonito, ligero pero nada chafa, lo compré como calentador para la recámara de mi bebé, me encanta que tiene control remoto, diferentes velocidades, temporizador, modo silencioso, modo sin luz, y también es ventilador, según yo enfría no solo echa aire, me encantó y el precio está súper bajo, lo recomiendo ampliamente, compraré otro
Otimo aparelho. No entanto, a tomada é quelas quadradas antigas, que nao usamos mais no Brasil. Mas tirando isso é um aparelho excelente, recomendo !!

Al principio tenía dudas con respecto a adquirir un heater ya que nunca había adquirido uno. Es un maravilloso producto, es estético, no hace nada de ruido, vivo en Cdmx y en días súper fríos basta con poner la función de Heat 1 y con eso es suficiente para calentar toda la habitación o sala. El diseño esta hermoso! Ocupa poco espacio y cabe en todos lados, trae un cable largo y no pesa. Estamos muy contentas con nuestra compra y a pesar de que tuvimos que pagar la importación vale cada peso este producto, lo recomiendo muchísimo, definitivamente es de los mejores que hay, los más modernos.
